props.description: Add a map to an HTML document.

cssFile.description:
The MapboxGL CSS file to use; defaults to
"//api.tiles.mapbox.com/mapbox-gl-js/v1.3.0/mapbox-gl.css".
cssFile.name: cssFile

animationOptions.description: Options common to camera animation through bounds, center, or zoom
animationOptions.name: animationOptions

as.description: The name of an HTML element that hosts the map; defaults to div.
as.name: as

bounds.description:
Pans and zooms the map to contain its visible area within the specified
geographical bounds. Changing this value will cause the map position/zoom
to change. The appearance of the transition can be controlled through
animationOptions and motionType.
bounds.name: bounds

center.description:
The geographical center point of the map. Changing this value will cause
the map position to change. The appearance of the transition can be
controlled through animationOptions and motionType.
center.name: center

type.name: [number, number] | { lat: number; lng: number; } | CenterOptions | undefined

className.description: A class name to set on the containing DIV element.
className.name: className

fadeDuration.description:
Controls the duration of the fade-in/fade-out animation for label
collisions, in milliseconds.
fadeDuration.name: fadeDuration

maxBounds.description: The map will be constrained to the given bounds.
maxBounds.name: maxBounds

maxZoom.description: The maximum zoom level of the map (0-24).
maxZoom.name: maxZoom

minZoom.description: The minimum zoom level of the map (0-24).
minZoom.name: minZoom

motionType.description:
How the camera moves when transitioning from one location to another
through bounds, center, or zoom.
motionType.name: motionType

onBoxzoomcancel.description: Fired when a "box zoom" interaction ends.
onBoxzoomcancel.name: onBoxzoomcancel

onBoxzoomend.description: Fired when a "box zoom" interaction ends.
onBoxzoomend.name: onBoxzoomend

onBoxzoomstart.description: Fired when a "box zoom" interaction starts.
onBoxzoomstart.name: onBoxzoomstart

onClick.description:
Fired when a pointing device (usually a mouse) is pressed and released at
the same point on the map.
onClick.name: onClick

onContextmenu.description:
Fired when the right button of the mouse is clicked or the context menu key
is pressed within the map.
onContextmenu.name: onContextmenu

onDblclick.description:
Fired when a pointing device (usually a mouse) is clicked twice at the same
point on the map.
onDblclick.name: onDblclick

onData.description: Fired when any map data loads or changes.
onData.name: onData

onDataloading.description:
Fired when any map data (style, source, tile, etc) begins loading or
changing asynchronously. All dataloading events are followed by a data or
error event.
onDataloading.name: onDataloading

onDrag.description: Fired repeatedly during a "drag to pan" interaction..
onDrag.name: onDrag

onDragend.description: Fired when a "drag to pan" interaction ends.
onDragend.name: onDragend

onDragstart.description: Fired when a "drag to pan" interaction starts.
onDragstart.name: onDragstart

onError.description:
Fired when an error occurs. This is GL JS's primary error reporting
mechanism. We use an event instead of throw to better accommodate
asyncronous operations. If no listeners are bound to the error event, the
error will be printed to the console.
onError.name: onError

onIdle.description:
Fired after the last frame rendered before the map enters an "idle" state:
no camera transitions are in progress, all currently requested tiles have
loaded, all fade/transition animations have completed.
onIdle.name: onIdle

onLoad.description:
Fired immediately after all necessary resources have been downloaded and
the first visually complete rendering of the map has occurred.
onLoad.name: onLoad

onMousedown.description: Fired when a pointing device (usually a mouse) is pressed within the map.
onMousedown.name: onMousedown

onMousemove.description: Fired when a pointing device (usually a mouse) is moved within the map.
onMousemove.name: onMousemove

onMouseout.description: Fired when a point device (usually a mouse) leaves the map's canvas.
onMouseout.name: onMouseout

onMouseover.description: Fired when a pointing device (usually a mouse) is moved within the map.
onMouseover.name: onMouseover

onMouseup.description: Fired when a pointing device (usually a mouse) is released within the map.
onMouseup.name: onMouseup

onMove.description:
Fired repeatedly during an animated transition from one view to another, as
the result of either user interaction or a fly transition.
onMove.name: onMove

onMoveend.description:
Fired just after the map completes a transition from one view to another,
as the result of either user interaction or a jump transition.
onMoveend.name: onMoveend

onMovestart.description:
Fired just before the map begins a transition from one view to another, as
the result of either user interaction or a jump transition.
onMovestart.name: onMovestart

onPitch.description:
Fired whenever the map's pitch (tilt) changes as the result of either user
interaction or a fly transition.
onPitch.name: onPitch

onPitchend.description:
Fired whenever the map's pitch (tilt) finishes changing as the result of
either user interaction or a fly transition.
onPitchend.name: onPitchend

onPitchstart.description:
Fired whenever the map's pitch (tilt) begins a change as the result of
either user interaction or a fly transition.
onPitchstart.name: onPitchstart

onRemove.description: Fired immediately after the map has been removed.
onRemove.name: onRemove

onRender.description:
Fired whenever the map is drawn to the screen, as the result of: a change
to the map's position, zoom, pitch, or bearing; a change to the map's
style; a change to a GeoJSON source; the loading of a vector tile, GeoJSON
file, glyph, or sprite.
onRender.name: onRender

onResize.description: Fired immediately after the map has been resized.
onResize.name: onResize

onRotate.description: Fired repeatedly during a "drag to rotate" interaction.
onRotate.name: onRotate

onRotateend.description: Fired when a "drag to rotate" interaction ends.
onRotateend.name: onRotateend

onRotatestart.description: Fired when a "drag to rotate" interaction starts.
onRotatestart.name: onRotatestart

onSourcedata.description:
Fired when one of the map's sources loads or changes, including if a tile
belonging to a source loads or changes.
onSourcedata.name: onSourcedata

onSourcedataloading.description:
Fired when one of the map's sources begins loading or changing
asynchronously. All sourcedataloading events are followed by a sourcedata
or error event.
onSourcedataloading.name: onSourcedataloading

onStyledata.description: Fired when the map's style loads or changes.
onStyledata.name: onStyledata

onStyledataloading.description:
Fired when the map's style begins loading or changing asynchronously. All
styledataloading events are followed by a styledata or error event.
onStyledataloading.name: onStyledataloading

onStyleimagemissing.description:
Fired when an icon or pattern needed by the style is missing. The missing
image can be added within this event listener callback to prevent the image
from being skipped. This event can be used to dynamically generate icons
and patterns.
onStyleimagemissing.name: onStyleimagemissing

onTouchcancel.description: Fired when a touchcancel event occurs within the map.
onTouchcancel.name: onTouchcancel

onTouchend.description: Fired when a touchend event occurs within the map.
onTouchend.name: onTouchend

onTouchmove.description: Fired when a touchmove event occurs within the map.
onTouchmove.name: onTouchmove

onTouchstart.description: Fired when a touchstart event occurs within the map.
onTouchstart.name: onTouchstart

onWebglcontextlost.description: Fired when the WebGL context is lost.
onWebglcontextlost.name: onWebglcontextlost

onWebglcontextrestored.description: Fired when the WebGL context is restored.
onWebglcontextrestored.name: onWebglcontextrestored

onWheel.description: Fired when a wheel event occurs within the map.
onWheel.name: onWheel

onZoom.description:
Fired repeatedly during an animated transition from one zoom level to
another, as the result of either user interaction or a fly transition.
onZoom.name: onZoom

onZoomend.description:
Fired just after the map completes a transition from one zoom level to
another, as the result of either user interaction or a fly transition.
onZoomend.name: onZoomend

onZoomstart.description:
Fired just before the map begins a transition from one zoom level to
another, as the result of either user interaction or a fly transition.
onZoomstart.name: onZoomstart

style.description:
The map's Mapbox style. This must be an a JSON object conforming to the
schema described in the Mapbox Style Specification, or a URL to such JSON.
style.name: style

zoom.description:
The zoom level of the map. The appearance of the transition can be
controlled through animationOptions and motionType.
zoom.name: zoom
